snippet.textDisplay: This game is a delight. I finished it one ~3 hours sitting, I couldn't put it down. It ticks all the boxes of a game that makes me finish it to completion, without a single thing left to do. You're a little bird who just wants to hike up the mountain in the middle of the island and as you progress, you encounter other hikers that often have side missions for you. You can also find feathers hidden around the island that allow you to fly higher/longer. The gameplay just feels perfect, the pixelated 3D graphics are vibrant and the music is charming. The whole game oozes charm and I couldn't stop smiling. Pure pleasure mixed with some Animal Crossing vibes. I cannot recommend it enough. A Short Hike is one of the best short games I've ever played.

snippet.textDisplay:
hey supra,
first things first this is my favourite channel on the internet. ;)
i've been around for almost 10 years now.. 🙈 i can't believe it's that long already..
i remember when you thought about quitting and i am so proud of you for keeping on!
but i've got one question: i've signed for a membership for your channel. are you really getting the money or am i just giving out money to youtube ? 😅
if you get it: i will proudly support you from now on! 
keep up the way you always did! ♥️
love from germany

snippet.textDisplay: Hi Johannes, thanks for your good words and continued support! It means everything to me and the community is what keeps this channel going. All membership revenue goes directly to me. Cheers!
snippet.textOriginal: Hi Johannes, thanks for your good words and continued support! It means everything to me and the community is what keeps this channel going. All membership revenue goes directly to me. Cheers!

snippet.textDisplay: I'm so happy this game is on your top3 of 2019. I absolutely loved how wholesome and relaxing it is and I really felt good exploring the island and speaking with all those lovely characters.
snippet.textOriginal: I'm so happy this game is on your top3 of 2019. I absolutely loved how wholesome and relaxing it is and I really felt good exploring the island and speaking with all those lovely characters.

snippet.textDisplay: That bass is straight out of corridors of time lol. Sounds pretty though

snippet.textDisplay: It was a nice game, just relaxing and simple.
snippet.textOriginal: It was a nice game, just relaxing and simple.

snippet.textDisplay: I went into this with high expectations so I was kind of let down by how simplistic it was. Didn't really leave an impression on me and I was kind of irked by how positive and same-y each character's dialogue was.
snippet.textOriginal: I went into this with high expectations so I was kind of let down by how simplistic it was. Didn't really leave an impression on me and I was kind of irked by how positive and same-y each character's dialogue was.

snippet.textDisplay: i don't think it was meant to have a super deep psyche for each character. More like... what you expect from normal countryside folks.
snippet.textOriginal: i don't think it was meant to have a super deep psyche for each character. More like... what you expect from normal countryside folks.
